ModMetaData.name: Pop Growth
ModMetaData.author: prophetly01
ModMetaData.description:
This basic mod allows you to have more colonist than vanilla.
NOW there is NO MORE POPULATION LIMIT! and you always get colonists from different events/sources.
It's not like you always get colonists every time. It's about limiting your popcurve.
Basically when you reach 7~9 colonists, there is no way to buy SLAVES! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- + >> Wanderers able to join even if you have +100 pawns
+ >> Quest rewards pawns even if you have thousand of pawns
+ >> Slaves are no longer disappearing when you reach the population limit.
+ >> Transport pod crash event no longer stops when you reach the pop limit.
